OK, my opinion on my first day of playing. it's a good game. will it ever meet up to what tf2 has done and will continue to do? no absolutely not. if tf2 never came to be then OW2 would never be here, tf2 laid the foundations of hero shooters and OW2 only captured part of the masterpiece that is Tf2. The overall gameplay of OW2 is great. the only thing that NEEDS to be worked on is 1: the amount of microtransactions. TF2 has many ways to spend money but its not done in a way that affects Gameply. in OW2 heroes are locked behind the battle pass. the reason the TF2s contract system works is BC its a ONE TIME payment and you don't have a time limit on when you need to complete them. the other is team comp. if your playing quick play there is a big chance that all of the good players will end up on the same team. TF2 also has this problem but the games are much bigger. if one teammate is new then the other 11 can carry. in OW2 if one person is bad you down a core part of your team. Also, there is some overlap with some heroes whereas TF2 has 9, and always has always will. they are all only good in their respective ways to play the game. medic can't do a lot of DPS whereas a few Support heroes seem to be able to deal a lot of DPS. overall I think it's an ok game ill play more of.

特别说明：此条“不推荐”与差评性质不同，且与游戏本身无关，只针对于美国加州暴雪娱乐公司总部上层管理人员与动视暴雪表示强烈谴责，并向炉石传说首席设计师Ben Brode、守望先锋游戏总监Jeff Kaplan、魔兽世界《燃烧的远征》资料片首席设计师Tom Chilton、星际争霸2首席设计师Dustin Browder献上作为玩家最真挚的感谢，谢谢你们创造了一个个真实而令人感动的世界，使其与“虚拟世界”脱离，成为真正意义上的游戏世界。如果您是一位新玩家，请不要因为我的这条评论错过守望先锋，世界上最好玩的Fps游戏之一，谢谢！
  本人是暴雪全家桶玩家，09年网易接管九城拿下国服代理权，战网建成以来充值记录达20页。作为魔兽世界玩家，完整体验了燃烧的远征至暗影国度资料片所有剧情，并多次全种族全职业满级（等级动态平衡），达成十数项光辉事迹.受父母影响第一次接触了西方世界便源于此，魔兽世界时至今日仍是世界上最好的MMORPG之一，作为玩家我也自豪地认为这是我玩过最好的游戏之一。一句话概括：安度因从幼年至继位到被典狱长控制，我伴随着其从模糊僵硬的建模到清晰坚毅的模样，我现实的人生也是如此。
  作为星际争霸2玩家，完整体验了自由之翼、虫群之心、虚空之遗资料片与诺娃隐秘行动包战役全部内容，天梯自由之翼、虚空之翼资料片钻石段位，合作模式全指挥官满级，扬升100级，有2个威望三,且玩过多种游戏大厅的小游戏.
  作为暗黑玩家，参与美服暗黑3测试版本，国服荆棘流豆角单人120层，游戏时长500+，战役全通，大小米通关几百余次，也完成了暗黑4的剧情内容，但不是很喜欢bd就没玩下去了。
  作为炉石玩家，开服动物园、奴隶战、T7猎到后来的挖宝、宇宙、dk，十职业多个号胜场1000+，虽然没有上过传说，因为长时间都在玩娱乐卡组，也看戴佳伟直播，这个游戏对我来说没有什么竞争性，只有棋牌游戏最简单的快乐，直到关服前我仍在玩酒馆战旗.
  作为守望先锋玩家，我曾是国服222排位、夺旗排位、踢球排位500强，四个号游戏等级超过2000级，游戏时长超过1000小时，源氏单英雄时长应该也有几百小时了，我仍记得2017年打开游戏时的震惊，将我从魔兽世界里拽向了一个需要英雄的世界，从此便一发不可收拾，在ow里沉沉浮浮，认识了各种各样的人，H键切换英雄我总是会恍惚，像是切换了人生，当然说这个游戏改变了我的童年也不为过，时至今日我对其仍有遗憾，也会为游戏阻碍了我现实的人生而暗自懊恼，但细细想来，只有感动而已。
  我想我有资格作为一个玩家评价一下暴雪，毫无疑问暴雪是世界上最出色的游戏公司之一，但这里的出色指的是游戏，指的是那些怀有童心与梦想，愿意为了人类之梦辛勤努力的真正“设计师”们，而非暴雪的运营与管理人员。大厦之间，挽之将倾于危难的是一种人，肆意挥洒他人梦想，于末日便忘却人之初心的是一种人，也是毫无疑问，这两种人曾处于一种微妙平衡，而今却是彻底倒向一边.
  我为游戏史上有过那个最初只是靠魔兽争霸起家的小作坊暴雪，那个为了玩家设计师跑编玩家论坛聆听美服喷子的初代暴雪设计师而深表感激，为肆意篡改前人框架、修改游戏本质的设计师而感到痛惜，更为将游戏玩弄于商业之中的利益群体，而深表愤怒！
  王权没有永恒，但暴雪代表的从来都不是王朝，而是游戏玩家最最普通的玩者之心而已，可惜，此心已然黯淡，再难光净.
  写在最后的也是那个我曾破口大骂，离开后却深感怀念的那个人留给玩家的最后的话：Never accept the world as it appears to be, always dare to see for what
it could be.
  谢谢你们做过这样的游戏，谢谢我玩了这么久你们的游戏，GG.

我们热爱的是守望先锋，是那个在2016年5月4开始，2022年10月3日为止的守望先锋，让我们6个人热血奋战的守望先锋，拥有姐夫的守望先锋。这个世界所需要的守望先锋，不是一款没有网易的守望先锋2，不是一款上架Steam的守望先锋2，不是一款没有中国服务器的守望先锋2。
这个世界值得我们为之奋斗，这款游戏也值得我们为此买单，但这一切都终结在了2023年1月24日，终结在了我们最后的记忆里，终结在了没有任何战斗的一局比赛里，终结在了大家一句句的有缘再见中。
2020年我曾说过，假如守望先锋要出2，那么我将会毫不犹豫的买下它，但是现在他甚至没有了中国服务器，我又凭什么要给你的PVE买单呢？更何况它还只是个半成品。
6V6变成5V5？麦克雷闪光弹改掉？末日铁拳变成T位？你们看看你们改版的东西有考虑过玩家吗？哦，对，你们丝毫不考虑玩家的建议，一直都是在教我们玩家玩游戏。你要不要去看看隔壁Apex为什么会在没有中国服务器的情况下也火的一塌糊涂？哦，对，你学到了没有中国服务器，你学到了通行证系统。
还有你新设计的那个破UI，什么玩意，干脆别叫守望先锋2了，我给你想一个，就叫守望先锋大型测试（纯纯半成品版）。
不想继续说了，真晦气。
What we love is the Overwahch, who started on May 4, 2016 and ended on October 3, 2022. He is the Overwahch who has made the six of us fight with passion, and has Jeff Kaplan as the Overwahch. The Overwahch that this world needs is not a Overwahch2 without NetEase, a Overwahch2 with Steam, or a Overwahch2 without Chinese servers.
This world is worth fighting for, and this game is also worth paying for, but it all came to an end on January 24, 2023, in our last memories, in a game without any battles, and in every goodbye we had.
In 2020, I once said that if Overwahch wanted to offer 2, I would not hesitate to buy it. But now that he doesn't even have Chinese servers, why should I pay for your PVE? Moreover, it is only a semi-finished product.
6V6 to 5V5? Change the McCree's flash bomb? Doomfist Becomes T-position? Have you considered players in your revised version? Oh, yes, you don't give a damn about player suggestions, you've been teaching us players how to play games. Do you want to go and see why Apex is so popular without Chinese servers? Oh, yes, you learned about not having Chinese servers, you learned about the pass system.
And the broken UI you've designed, what kind of thing? Don't even call it Overwahch2. I'll think of one for you, and it's called Overwahch Large Test (pure semi-finished version).
I don't want to continue talking, it's really unlucky.

OW2 rebranded from OW promising a PVE gamemode. The day they announced they were cancelling PVE, I uninstalled OW2 and have never gone back. Casual gamers and ones that given in to microtransactions will never change the way this company monetizes their audience. As an individual, there's not much you can do to change the way a company targets their audience to meet financial goals. But the predatory nature of how they go about it plus the insincerity the company has time and time again displayed, I cannot support such a devious company. 0/10 don't support greed trash

脑瘫游戏

Scammed of $40 for the bundle :( On a real not here my ranking of the transformer movies

Transformers Dark of the Moon: My favorite one because it has some of the best action sequences in the entire Franchise. The plot was actually decent had a few emotional tugs. Badass Decepticon Shockwave was here although his death was a bit anti-climatic. This was also Shia's last movie and it pretty much has a lot of what the original had and what made it so good. The only reason I put this one above Transformers 1 is because of the action! I watch these movies for entertainment and action and not as a movie critic. It's like watching Asian fighting movies without caring how bad the plot is or how bad the actors are, you're there for the fight scenes, no matter how bad the rest of the movie may be.

Transformers 1: The OG! I think all the following Transformer movies except for part 3, should have followed the template set out by this movie. It did EVERYTHING right from the action sequences to the good, but simple plot. The comedy jokes were timed well and so were the emotional set pieces. Megatron gave Prime a good fight and the final city battle is probably my favorite action sequence of the entire franchise.

Transformers: Age of Extinction: I know I know, a lot of people consider this one to be the worst or one of the worst, but I actually enjoyed it. Lockdown was such a cool transformer. Although he was a bit overpowered, he is my favorite villain behind Megatron. Everything from his alternate form to his overpowered grenades to his insane face cannon. Heck I even love his voice actor because I knew him from other movies and that made me like Lockdown all the more. Marky Mark wasn't so bad surprisingly, he was actually tolerable. I just wished they would have found a reason to make Lockdown and Megatron/Galvatron fight because that would have been an epic fight!

Transformers: Revenge of The Fallen: Even though it's second to last on my list, I didn't really hate it like sooo many people did or do. The action sequences were okay and could have been better, the best one taking place in the forest. I love fights and good action sequences, so I set a high bar when it comes to them. One thing that turns me off is a Mary Sue in these regards. Megatron gave Optimus a good fight in first movie, but here he jsut gets WRECKED. HE barely puts up a fight and I was really hoping for more. I knew Optimus would win of course, but come on! They could have made that battle a bit better.

Transformers: The Last Knight: Okay this is one is definitely the worst one and a lot of people agree with that. I'm usually very forgiving and not too harsh considering the fact the some of the movies people hated, I actually really liked. I disregard plot and only focus on entertainment and it has served me well in watching films like this, but this was just an abomination. I really tried to get into it and give it a chance, but it was just not so. The overly complicated plot goes against some of the stuff from previous films and then having Stanley Tucci play Merlin was just a WTF moment. It's like the movie knew it would suck and didn't care. Optimus turning bad could have been used for soo much more. He appears near the end when I was hoping he would make a few appearences causing trouble for the good guys, but alas another anti climatic moment strikes again! The action sequences were kind of whack and easily the worst of the series IMO. The best one was probably Bumblebee fighting Optimus. Quintessa was nothing special and the KSI Megatron body is magically gone. I wanted to see his KSI chassis in action because I actually liked how it performed in AOE, but Megatron just looked like himself without explaining what happened to that body. Like I said, I really tried to find a reason to like this movie, but it was just that bad
